data.title: AdKaora's international expansion continues: acquisition of Adgage has completed
data.description_short: AdKaora's growth in international markets continues, proceeding with the 100% acquisition of Adgage, a Spanish company specializing in mobile advertising and in-game advertising.

Tran","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"CEO of AdKaora","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", says, \"When we acquired 30 percent of Adgage in 2021, we had taken a proud first step toward the foreign market expansion of our products. I'm really excited thinking about the outstanding results we have already achieved together over the past year and the opportunity to open up to important new markets. This is all thanks to the talented team at Adgage, with whom we started working in strong harmony right away, with a shared vision toward continuous innovation for the benefit of brands. I see a future in which the value of these synergies will be fully manifested through an increasingly integrated and successful range of offerings.\"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Add, ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Gonzalo Guzm√°n","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" and ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Daniel Shaikh","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Founder of Adgage","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":": \"As Adgage we are very happy to be able to accelerate and strengthen our development path being able to count from today on the resources, solidity and reputation of an important publishing group such as the Mondadori Group. Technological synergies and the sharing of professional resources with AdKaora and Hej! will allow us to strengthen and evolve Adgage's offering and to be able to introduce new, innovative and effective adtech solutions in the Spanish, Portuguese and soon Latam markets.\"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Antonio Porro","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Chief Executive Officer ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"of the","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":" Mondadori Group","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", concludes, \"We are proud of the strong and continuous growth we have been having for over 5 years in the digital advertising market, growth that allows us to be today one of the most important players in the digital sector, being able to count on unique and distinctive assets represented by our agencies AdKaora and Hej! and our digital brands Giallozafferano, Mypersonaltrainer and Focus. We think that part of this offer can continue to strengthen also by opening up to foreign markets and through the integration of promising realities, such as Adgage. The transaction represents a further step in the Mondadori Group's strategy to seize new opportunities, including through acquisitions, to consolidate and grow our Digital Media Area.\"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
